sense.def:
Kadar je neka stvar
separate from another
, ti dve stvari nista povezani, ampak sta vsaka zase.

seg.quote: Rosa had remained separate from us, asking for a room by herself.
Two masses can be kept separate inside the bomb casing.
What we achieve together is more important than what we can do separately.

sense.def:
Stvari, ki so
separate
, se med seboj razlikujejo in jih obravnavamo vsako posebej.

seg.quote: The sunlight caught each tiny separate hair and made it shine.

sense.def:
To separate people, things or ideas
pomeni prostorsko razdeliti osebe ali stvari oziroma posamično obravnavati ljudi, stvari ali ideje.

seg.quote: In any angry discussion he would separate the opponents and soothe them.
It is important to separate learning English orally from learning English by reading books.

sense.def:
Kadar podrobnost
separates one thing from another thing
, se zaradi nje ena stvar razlikuje od druge.

seg.quote: Higher living standards separate the older generation from their children.

sense.def:
Kadar stvar, obdobje ali razdalja
separates two people or things
, preprečuje stik med dvema osebama ali predmetoma.

seg.quote: A fence at the back of the garden separated us from the neighbours.
...the Great Lakes separating Canada from America.

sense.def:
To separate a group of things
ali
to separate a group of things out
pomeni razdeliti skupino stvari, tako da vsak del postane samostojen.

seg.quote: Most schools decide to separate out their pupils into different groups according to age.

sense.def:
Kadar skupina stvari ali ljudi
separate
, so nekaj časa skupaj ali povezani, potem pa gredo vsak v svojo smer.

cit.quote: ločiti se, raziti se, razdeliti se

seg.quote: They talked by the gate, unwilling to separate.
The two pipes separated from each other.

sense.def:
Kadar zakonca
separate
, se odločita, da ne bosta več živela skupaj.
